label: 女用訓蒙図彙
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: じょようきんもうずい
説明文: (1700) A manual [of advice on raising daughters, which] taught them the correct names for different articles of clothing, furniture, household utensils, how to wear garments and apply cosmetics, and how to wrap a present and attach the correct knots and presentation message (p. 723).
